articles.author: Dominic Rushe
articles.title: Oil company profits boom as Americans reel from high fuel prices - The Guardian
articles.description: ExxonMobil posts second-quarter profits of $17.85bn – four times last year’s figure – with Chevron making $11.62bn
articles.content:

articles.title: "We Will Never Merge": Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal On Uber Merger Reports - NDTV
articles.description: Ola chief executive Bhavish Aggarwal has denied media reports of merger talks with Uber. Mr Aggarwal tweeted Ola is "very profitable and growing well" and the reports of merger talks with the American ride-hailing firm are "absolute rubbish".
articles.content:
Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal denied the firm is in merger talks with Uber
